name: B3 (Base)
description: B3 is a Layer 3 blockchain settlement layer built on Base, designed to revolutionize onchain gaming through its [Open Gaming](https://opengaming.b3.fun/) ecosystem. By addressing key pain points in blockchain-based gaming, B3 enhances accessibility for both developers and players. Its infrastructure minimizes transaction costs, simplifies onboarding, and fosters a collaborative ecosystem where games share liquidity, incentives, and audiences. The $B3 token serves as the backbone of the ecosystem, ensuring seamless interaction across multiple games and chains, enabling * Governance * Staking * In-game transactions
